name: Cerebral Game Stew
description:
Welcome to Cerebral Game Stew!

How will the game look, play, smell, or taste?

Try a random seed-code and explore a vast STEW of possible games! Or just input your favourite number and see what comes from it, the power is YOURS.

A little experimental game made for the PROC JAM 2016.

CONTROLS
WASD to move.
Use your handy MOUSE to shoot things.
